title: 【國際交流活動】加拿大里賈納大學 University of Regina 2025 short-term programs
department: 國際事務處國際學生組

author.department: 國際事務處國際學生組
author.name: 呂姿穎

content:
分類： 活動公告
來源： 國際事務處國際學生組 - 呂姿穎 - issa@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話5173
對象： 全校學生
標題： 【國際交流活動】加拿大里賈納大學 University of Regina 2025 short-term programs
日期： Thu, 7 Nov 2024 13:44:52 +0800
附檔： UofRESL-Winter-Language-Culture-Poster-2025-DIGITAL.pdf (262 KB)   Winter 2025 In-person Language and Culture Description.pdf (100 KB)   How to Apply for the In-Person Language and Culture Program at the University of Regina.pdf (2 MB)   
English version in below

◎時間：

2025年2月3日-2月21日、
2025年3月3日-3月21日

◎地點：加拿大 里賈納大學

◎費用：3,220加幣（不包含機票、保險及其他個人花費）

◎報名截止時間：

2月冬令營截止日: 2024.11.30
3月冬令營截止日: 2024.12.15

◎報名流程

1.填寫google 表單向國際處報名，同時繳交以下文件：

Google form：https://reurl.cc/2jAzQ9

*在學證明
*家長同意書

2.自行到姊妹校提供之連結報名: https://reurl.cc/Gp98bZ

3.等待姐妹校通知。

注意事項：

1. 有任何申請問題可以聯繫活動承辦人:  esl@uregina.ca
2. 具體申請細節及其他資訊請詳閱簡章。
3. 國際處僅公告或協助本校學生報名參加簽約校的短期活動或課程，其短期課程是否可抵免本校學分，參加學生需遵照教務處相關規定辦理。若活動日期為本校學期上課期間，學生須依照本校規定自行辦理請假手續。

English version

◎Period：

February 3~ February 21 , 2025
March 3~ March 21, 2025

◎Location：University of Regina, Canada

◎Fee：3,220 CAD (Excluding airfare, insurance, and other personal expenses)

◎Registration Deadline：

February Winter Camp Deadline: November 30, 2024
March Winter Camp Deadline: December 15, 2024

1. Sign up via google form and upload below documents to OIA.

Google form：https://reurl.cc/2jAzQ9

*Student Status Certificate
*Parental Consent Letter

2. Complete application at : https://reurl.cc/Gp98bZ

3. Await the announcement from University of Regina.

For further information, please visit their website and check out their brochure.

Please note:

1. For any application inquiries, please contact the program organizer at: esl@uregina.ca
2. For detailed application instructions and other information, please refer to the brochure.
3. The OIA only announces or assists our school’s students in registering for short-term activities or courses offered by contracted schools. Whether credits from these short-term courses can be transferred to our school is subject to the regulations of the Academic Affairs Office, and participating students must comply accordingly. If the activity falls within our school’s academic semester, students must follow our school’s regulations to apply for leave of absence.
